ygData.authorName: You've been taken by the wind
ygData.subject: Re: Verant ruined the revive line of spellsy
ygData.msgSnippet: ... And a Hierophant s Crook?   That was found on a live server (Xegony, if I recall correctly). -- We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 30 Jul 1999, Perhaps a Princess... wrote:

> Err. The only place a verified Oaken Scimitar has been found is on the
> test server. the GM activate the Quest for a specific person, then
> deactivated it, in that case.
>
> Other than that, this is still a myth on any real server.

And a Hierophant's Crook? That was found on a live server (Xegony, if
I recall correctly).

--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell of
smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
